name: Remove Twitter Round
description: Removes the new Round UI for a mostly rectangular layout (like before) . Higher-res Preview http://prntscr.com/fk57l0
additional_info:
- 9/25/17 - Changed a few classes to correspond with Twitter's newer styles
- 8/9/17 - Add a few more classes that were changed in Twitter's stylesheets
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("https://twitter.com") {
/* profile pictures */
	
	.Avatar,
	.DashboardProfileCard-avatarImage,
	.DashboardProfileCard-avatarLink,
	.Gallery.is-tweetless .Gallery-content,
	.Gallery.is-tweetless .Gallery-media,
	.Gallery.with-tweet.without-tweet .Gallery-media,
	.Gallery.with-tweet.without-tweet .Gallery-content,
	.MomentCapsuleCover .MomentUserByline-avatar,
	.MomentCapsuleItemTweet--withText .MomentUserByline-avatar,
	.MomentCapsuleSummary .MomentUserByline-avatar,
	.MomentMakerRecommendedTweetsSearch--users .MomentMakerRecommendedTweetsSearch-userContainer .avatar,
	.ProfileAvatar,
	.ProfileAvatar-image,
	.ProfileAvatar-placeholderImage,
	.ProfileAvatarEditing,
	.ProfileAvatarEditing-button,
	.ProfileAvatarEditing-overlay,
	.ProfileCard-avatarImage,
	.ProfileCard-avatarLink,
	.ProfileCardMini-avatarImage,
	.ProfileListItem-avatar,
	.ProfileUserList .Avatar,
	.avatar,
	.DMAvatar,
	.nav .session .dropdown-toggle
	{
		border-radius: 3px !important;
	}
	/* input boxes & buttons */
	
	.RichEditor,
	.global-nav .search-input,
	.EdgeButton,
	.EdgeButton:visited,
	.DMComposer-container
	{
		border-radius: 7px !important;
	}
}
